title: Drawing, "Designs for Shaped Bottles for Packaging in Sets of Three, for Issey Miyake", 1998
medium: Rollerball pen in black ink on paper
signed: Signed in rollerball pen in black ink, upper left: Rashid. Feb 19/98
inscribed: Inscribed in rollerball pen in black ink, upper half of sheet, center:  [arrow pointing left] for joining together like men's·; right:  3 together; left:  BPI· Rashid. Feb. 19/98.; center, right:  [arrow pointing right]; lower half of sheet, right:  [arrow pointing right];  center:  [arrow pointing right]; left:  [on quiver bottle] ISSEY MIYAKE/ [on "Garbo"  bottle] ISSEY MIYAKE
description: Various designs for different shaped bottles intended to be part of a set of three.  Forms include rounded "pebble" shape with a hole through the center; an oblong shape with "quiver" sides and "Garbo" form (as in "Garbo" waste can).

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Shaped Bottles for Packaging in Sets of Three, for Issey Miyake", 1998. Rollerball pen in black ink on paper. Gift of Karim Rashid. 2000-50-24.
